channel.title: Animation help
channel.description: ok, im trying to make a npc (stranger) realistic he does a double dds spec constantly and is from dt quest... well anyways i got it almost done although it's very crappy, i can't find the emote to make his arm swing like a dds spec, i've searched many emote and can find dds attack, but not the one that swings your arm on the spec.. any hints? or ideas?

item.title: Animation help
item.dc:creator: @omghydro omghydro
item.description:
@omghydro wrote:

yeah, i don’t know what to do with that rich sorry. but thanks anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Animation help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

public void gfxRich(int gfx) { mask100var1 = gfx; mask100var2 = 6553600; mask100update = true; updateRequired = true; }

} else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1919 && !plr.ProtMelee) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x426; plr.gfxRich(252); hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(2); } else if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1919 && plr.ProtMelee) { npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 0x426; plr.gfxRich(252); hitDiff = 0;

Read full topic

item.title: Animation help
item.dc:creator: @omghydro omghydro
item.description:
@omghydro wrote:

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1919 && plr.ProtMelee == false){
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 451;// this is what im looking for
plr.specGFX(252);// this gfx is correct, just completely backwards.
hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(2);
} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1919 && plr.ProtMelee == true){
npcs[NPCID].animNumber = 451;// this is what im looking for
plr.specGFX(252);
hitDiff = 0;

That’s what i have.
Thank you for your time on helping me with this.

item.title: Animation help
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

Seatch for anythin like this in NPCHandler

} else if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == XX){ npcs[NPCID].animNumber = YY;

Change the XX for the npc id and the YY for the animation =]

i hope this helps

Read full topic
